price: Wͻn asefoͻ a Yεsoaa wͻn wͻ (Noa) hyεn a ayε mma no mu no yε nsεnkyerεnee ma wͻn.
arabic: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمۡ أَنَّا حَمَلۡنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waāyatun lahum annā ḥamalnā dhurriyyatahum fī al-ful'ki al-mashḥūni
